question: about 12 days ago i had sex without a condom...the very next day i just didnt feel right...now granted i have been diagnosed with bronchitis? spelling...and this could all be a cause of that...my testicals hurt at the top and like at the base of my penis...also i have loose stool and the big thing that scares me is i have this pinching sensation on the head of my penis at the top...now i have had my family doctor do a visual exam and also a blood test for herpes...the blood test came back negative..now if in fact these symptoms i am having are from herpes wouldnt the blood test come back positive??? could this all be from me coughing alot and my glans rubbing on my boxers...there are no blisters...but its just this on again off again pinching sensation...it looks a little red but not bad...this has been going on from day one...wouldnt it take longer then a day for herpes to appear?...some one with knowledge on this topic help please
title: pinching sensation of the glans
